CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Cube time variable
CONTROLS.NAME: cube_rate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Toggle the cube on and off.
CONTROLS.NAME: no_cube

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Turn on to make cubes jump in and out of each other.
CONTROLS.NAME: cube_shift

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Scale the cube.
CONTROLS.NAME: cube_scale

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How thicc or thin the tubes are.
CONTROLS.NAME: tube_size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: scale the density of the tunnel structure.
CONTROLS.NAME: tunnel_density

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: base color, this color's complement will be calculated automatically
CONTROLS.NAME: base_color

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in media.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in rainbow color
CONTROLS.NAME: rainbow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
Determines how much the scene is only lit via the caustic lighting.
1.0 = Only Caustic Lighting, scene will fade to black as the audio fades.
0.0 = No Caustic Lighting
CONTROLS.NAME: caustic_presence

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Quickly snap auto_roll/turn/flip camera values to 0.0
CONTROLS.NAME: center_cam

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
ON: Cetner camera, LookXY set to (0.0), auto_roll/turn/flip set to 0.0. Userful for resetting controls manually. 
OFF: Return camera values to the values of their respective control panel values.
CONTROLS.NAME: hold_center_cam

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: reactive_time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically rotate the camera like a barrel roll.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_roll

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically turn the camera left or right from the origin.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_turn

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Automatically flip the camera up or down from the origin.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_flip

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
Move the X-axis to spin about your main axis, or move the Y-axis to tilt forwards or backwards.
moving all the way to any corner will look as if the camera is back at center.
CONTROLS.NAME: LookXY

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Field of View from the perspective of the camera.
CONTROLS.NAME: f_o_v

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flythrough Speed
CONTROLS.NAME: rate_in

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly apply a left vertical mirror.
CONTROLS.NAME: l_vert_mirr_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly apply a horizontal mirror.
CONTROLS.NAME: hor_mirr_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly ix between Left and Right vertical mirrors on beat detected.
CONTROLS.NAME: audio_mir

DESCRIPTION: An inside look at your synapses on a heavy dose of psybernautics.
TITLE: Psybernautic Neuron
